title.full: The MANLY Game for MANLY Men
title.reduced: The MANLY Game for MANLY Men

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. In the pursuit of true MANLINESS, hurl your Avatar down four scenic locations around the world while collecting ACME MAN BLAST. Are you manly enough to become the MANLIEST of MEN?!
